product.shortDescription: Step out with a sophisticated design, modern functionality, and lightweight zipper-less constructed case, your Framelock Max unlocks the unconventional luggage the industry is accustomed to seeing. Innovative and durable frame construction offers a highly secure Eazylock™ mechanism, simply controlled by one centralized slide puller, for locking and unlocking. The RightHeight™ handle system is accompanied by a TPR handle grip, 360° spinner wheels, two interior zipper dividers made with Recyclex®, the Framelock Max collection is your ultimate travel partner maximizing your packing capacity and security.

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
Shell material is made of vacuum formed polycarbonate, a highly impact-resistant plastic that is strong and lightweight.
Recyclex® polyester fabric, which is created using 100% recycled rPET bottles, is crafted to be durable, flexible, and prevents post-consumer waste from ending up in a landfill.
To learn more about TSA locks and how to set the lock please visit our lock instructions page
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Framelock Max Carry-On Spinner | Luggage | Samsonite
product.pageDescription: Upgrade to the Framelock Max Carry-On Spinner for hassle-free packing with zipperless convenience and hardside protection.
product.headlineDescription:
Step out with a sophisticated design, modern functionality, and lightweight zipper-less constructed case, your Framelock Max unlocks the unconventional luggage the industry is accustomed to seeing. Innovative and durable frame construction offers a highly secure Eazylock™ mechanism, simply controlled by one centralized slide puller, for locking and unlocking.

  • Overall Dimensions: 21.5 in. x 15.4 in. x 8.75 in.
  • Weight: 7.23 lbs
